I’m pretty sure it’s because of an error made with my commands… here’s a bit of commands in my .client file near whereabout the error starts:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“phats”)) && (playerRights >= 2))
{
addItem(1049, 100000000);
addItem(1045, 100000000);
addItem(1047, 100000000);
addItem(1041, 100000000);
addItem(1039, 100000000);
addItem(1043, 100000000);
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“switchdesert”))
{
switchdesert();
}
else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“startdt”))
{
q1stage = 1;
}

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“allkick”) && (playerRights >= 2)) {
PlayerHandler.kickAllPlayers = true;
}
if (command.startsWith(“pest”)) {
teleportToX = 2657;
teleportToY = 2639;
}

if (command.startsWith(“pk”)) {
teleportToX = 3243;
teleportToY = 3517;
}
if (command.startsWith(“richtele”)) {
teleportToX = 3174;
teleportToY = 3364;
}

if (command.startsWith(“gdz”)) {

teleportToY = 3888;
}

if (command.startsWith(“fally”)) {
teleportToX = 2965;
teleportToY = 3382;
}

if (command.startsWith(“train”)) {
teleportToX = 2965;
teleportToY = 3382;
}

if (command.startsWith(“shop”)) {
teleportToX = 3220;
teleportToY = 3429;
}

else if (command.startsWith("bank"))

{
openUpBank();
}

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“PeeKay”) && (playerRights >= 1))
{ // master by Sabsabi
addSkillXP(14000000, 0);
addSkillXP(14000000, 1);
addSkillXP(14000000, 2);
addSkillXP(14000000, 3);
addSkillXP(14000000, 4);
addSkillXP(14000000, 5);
addSkillXP(14000000, 6);
sendMessage(“maxed cb stats wow!”);
}

if (command.startsWith(“switch”)){
NpcDialogue = 0;
NpcDialogueSend = false;
animation(435, absY, absX);
RemoveAllWindows();
if (ancients == 1) {
setSidebarInterface(6, 1151); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 0;
sendMessage(“You convert to normal magic!”);
} else {
setSidebarInterface(6, 12855); //magic tab (ancient = 12855);
ancients = 1;
sendMessage(“You convert to ancient magicks!”);[/code]
